band

Class Band

  • java.lang.Object
    • band.Band
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Authenticatable

    public class Band
extends java.lang.Object
implements Authenticatable
    Class that contains all the information belonging to the band. Members, tracks and events can be added and removed. There are validity checks for the dates and to avoid duplicate elements. A history is saved in order to enable queries about the bands' past. There are Getters for Events, Tracks and Members which return all Objects at either a given key date or within a range. A Billing-Method has also been implemented which calculates the bands revenue within a given time frame.
    Author:
    OOP Gruppe 187

        public void addFinance(java.util.Date currentDate,

        the method adds positive @money to income and negative to expense. if @money is zero, nothing will be done.
        Parameters:
        currentDate - date of entry
        reason - short info why money was get or spent (i.e. "Merchandise" or "Advertisment")
        money - income if positive, expense if negative

      • addMember

        public void addMember(Member m,
             java.util.Date d)
               throws InvalidDateException,
                      InvalidBandObjectException
        Adds a member to the bands lineup
        Parameters:
        m - member to be added
        d - date the member (re)-joined the band
        Throws:
        InvalidDateException - thrown if the member has already joined AND left the band once AND the "leave-date" is after the new join-date
        InvalidBandObjectException - thrown if the member already exists

      • addTrack

        public void addTrack(Track t,
            java.util.Date d)
              throws InvalidDateException,
                     InvalidBandObjectException
        this method should only be used in Member
        Parameters:
        t - the track itself
        d - the date the track was added
        Throws:
        InvalidDateException - thrown if the track has already been added AND removed before AND the removal date is PRIOR to the new add date
        InvalidBandObjectException - thrown if the track already exists
